getNormalizedData

public ISBSIData getNormalizedData(ISBSIData original)
Gets a SBSIData object and normalizes the data in it.

Parameters:
original - the original file. Cannot be null.
Returns:
a new SBSIData object with the normalized values.

getRescaledData

public ISBSIData getRescaledData(ISBSIData original,
                                 double min,
                                 double max)
Gets an ISBSIData object and rescales it according to the given range.

Parameters:
original - cannot be null
min - the minimum value of the rescaled data
max - the maximum value of the rescaled data
Returns:
a rescaled ISBSIData object
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in the case the ISBSIData is null or the min is greater than the max
